CAboutDescriptionEN Constant

Unit: uAboutDescriptionText
Syntax
Delphi
const CAboutDescriptionEN = ''''#$0D#$0A'This program is intended for Pascal language developers who wish to add a copyright and version comment to the header of their source files (*.pas, *.dpr, *.dpk, *.lpr, ...).'#$0D#$0A#$0D#$0A'The comments are placed at the beginning of the source file before the standard start of the file content. They are in XML Documentation format with:'#$0D#$0A'- a <summary> explaining what the project or file is about,'#$0D#$0A'- a <remarks> containing license and copyright information,'#$0D#$0A'- <see> (in <remarks>)for links to the code repository and to the project site (if specified).'#$0D#$0A#$0D#$0A'These comments are supported in Delphi. They will not cause problems in other compilers, interpreters and editors.'#$0D#$0A'*****************'#$0D#$0A'* Publisher info'#$0D#$0A#$0D#$0A'This application was developed by Patrick Prémartin in Delphi.'#$0D#$0A#$0D#$0A'It is published by OLF SOFTWARE, a company registered in Paris (France) under the reference 439521725.'#$0D#$0A#$0D#$0A'****************'#$0D#$0A'* Personal data'#$0D#$0A#$0D#$0A'This program is autonomous in its current version. It does not depend on the Internet and communicates nothing to the outside world.'#$0D#$0A#$0D#$0A'We have no knowledge of what you do with it.'#$0D#$0A#$0D#$0A'No information about you is transmitted to us or to any third party.'#$0D#$0A#$0D#$0A'We use no cookies, no tracking, no stats on your use of the application.'#$0D#$0A#$0D#$0A'***************'#$0D#$0A'* User support'#$0D#$0A#$0D#$0A'If you have any questions or require additional functionality, please leave us a message on the application''s website or on its code repository.'#$0D#$0A#$0D#$0A'To find out more, visit https://copyrightpascalprojects.olfsoftware.fr/'#$0D#$0A''''
